Labour Statistics-Labour Force.Note: (a) Data up to 2010 are for the household population aged 10 years and above and data from 2011 onwards are for the household population aged 15 years and above (b) Northern Province is excluded for the years 2003, 2008, 2009 and 2010. (c) Mullaitivu and Kilinochchi districts were excluded for 2004 annual estimates. (d) Data from 2011 onwards include all districts. (e) QLFS was conducted as a one-off survey in August 2005. (f) Data excludes both Northern and Eastern Provinces for the years from 1990 to 2002, 2006 and 2007. (g) QLFS was not conducted in the 1st quarter of 2012 (h) In July 2016, the Department of Census and Statistics published a re-weighted and revised labour force data series for 2011 onwards.
Labour Statistics-Labour Force.Update frequency: fourteen weeks after the relevant quarter/fourteen weeks after the relevant year

Public Sector Employment-Government Inst.Note: (a) Other includes employees on contract and casual basis (b) Senior level represents Executives/Senior Executives; Judicial/Law Officers and Medical Officers (c) Tertiary level represents Field/Office based Officers; Supra/Special Class Management Assistants; Sri Lanka Principals’ Service; Police Inspectors/Chief Inspectors and similar posts in other Regulatory Services; Special Grades of Nurses/Professions Supplementary to Medical Services and Para-Medical Services; and Medical Practitioners (d) Secondary level represents Management Assistant (Technical and Non-Technical); Associate Officers; Sri Lanka Teachers’ Service; Police Constables/Sergeants/Sergeant Major/Sub-Inspectors and similar posts in other Regulatory Services; Supervisory Management Assistants; and Nurses/ PSM Services a
Public Sector Employment-Government Inst.Update frequency: Subsequent to completion of the survey
